title: [BUG] SKShader.CreateLinearGradient returns null
body:
**Description**
`SKShader.CreateLinearGradient` returns null at these parameters:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29846655/153790590-2b53ff62-4e5d-4abe-8bc1-67f121ea809b.png)
 
**Expected Behavior**
```
<returns>Returns a new <see cref="T:SkiaSharp.SKShader" />, or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.</returns>
```

**Actual Behavior**
Returns null.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.3
- Last known good version:  NA
- IDE:  Rider
